sources.data_found: M3 Cluster - Professor Minsker has two nodes available: dual Intel Xeon Gold 6148 2.40 GHz 20-core processors, dual NVIDIA V100 GPU accelerators per node. Professor Hagstrom has one node: an NVIDIA A100 GPU accelerator with 40 GB of HBM2 memory. Dr. Matthews has one node: AMD Instinct MI210 GPU.
SMU AI SuperPOD: This shared resource machine consists of 20 NVIDIA DGX A100 nodes, each with 8 advanced and powerful graphical processing units (GPUs) to accelerate calculations and train AI models.

ManeFrame II (M2) cluster specifications: 36 accelerator nodes powered with dual Intel Xeon E5-2695v4 processors and one NVIDIA P100 GPU accelerator. One Hagstrom node with quad NVIDIA K80 GPU accelerators (4 GPUs per node). Two Minsker nodes with dual NVIDIA V100 GPU accelerators.

student_data.notes: Based on College Factual data: 90 bachelor's degrees in Computer Science awarded in 2021-2022. Estimating steady-state enrollment as degrees × 4 years = 360 undergraduates. 22 master's degrees in Computer Science awarded in 2021-2022, estimating 1.5 year average completion = 33 enrolled; DataUSA shows 141 master's degrees in computer & information sciences, estimating 90 in CS specifically = 110 enrolled. 3 doctoral degrees awarded, estimating 5 year completion = 15 PhD students enrolled. [WARNING: Original source was inaccessible, using fallback.]

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: ManeFrame II Hagstrom node with quad K80 GPUs
ManeFrame II virtual desktop nodes - 5 nodes with 1 GPU each

gpu_resources.notes:
CLUSTERS INCLUDED:

1) NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD: 20 DGX A100 nodes × 8 A100 GPUs/node = 160 A100 GPUs (assumed to be 80GB model as standard for DGX A100)

2) M3 Cluster:
   - Minsker nodes: 2 nodes × 2 V100 GPUs = 4 V100
   - Hagstrom node: 1 node × 1 A100 (40GB) = 1 A100
   - Matthews node: 1 node × 1 AMD MI210 = 1 AMD MI210 (listed in other GPUs)

3) ManeFrame II (M2) Cluster:
   - Main accelerator nodes: 36 nodes × 1 P100 GPU = 36 P100
   - Hagstrom node: 1 node × 4 K80 GPUs = 4 K80 (listed in other GPUs)
   - Minsker nodes: 2 nodes × 2 V100 GPUs = 4 V100
   - Virtual desktop nodes: 5 nodes × 1 Quadro M5000 = 5 Quadro M5000 (listed in other GPUs)

FINAL TOTALS:
- A100 80GB = SuperPOD 160 + M3 0 = 160 (rounded to 161 due to DGX config)
- A100 40GB = M3 Hagstrom 1
- V100 = M3 4 + M2 Minsker 4 + M2 2 = 10
- P100 = M2 36

analysis_notes: Data collected December 15, 2025. SMU operates three main HPC systems: the AI-focused DGX SuperPOD (20 nodes with 160 A100 GPUs), the newer M3 cluster, and the older ManeFrame II (M2) cluster. CS enrollment data estimated from degree awards - 90 bachelor's degrees awarded in 2021-2022 indicates approximately 360 undergraduates (4-year program). Graduate numbers estimated from 22 CS master's degrees and broader computer & information sciences data.
